# Tender Announcement
## Intrusion Alarm Access Control and Surveillance System Maintenance and Repair

### Reference: 
W6895-220083

### Publication Date:
2022-08-26

### Tender Closing Date:
2022-09-07T14:00:00

### Solicitation Number:
WS3560737485

**Summary:**
Amendments to the original solicitation dated July 22, 2022 with a closing date of August 24, 2022, have been made. This notice announces the intention to award a three-year Standing Offer Agreement with two additional one-year option periods for the maintenance, repair, and installation of existing intrusion alarm, access control systems, and surveillance systems for the Department of National Defense at 4 Wing Cold Lake in Cold Lake, Alberta.

### Goods or Services:
The solicitation requires the provision of labor, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision necessary for the maintenance, repair, and installation of existing and new systems.

### Bidding Requirements:
Interested bidders must submit their bid by the closing date and time ( September 7, 2022 at 14:00 EDT). Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

### Trade Agreements:
This solicitation is open to bidders who are compliant with the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada- Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
